headline: VICI Properties Announces Pricing of Public Offering of $1.3 Billion of Senior Unsecured Notes
summary: NEW YORK, March 26, 2025--VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE: VICI) ("VICI Properties" or the "Company") announced today that its subsidiary, VICI Properties L.P. (the "Issuer"), has priced a public offering of $1.3 billion in aggregate principal amount of senior unsecured notes (the "Notes") consisting of:
